attributes.action: Persons criticised in privileges committee cannot accept Johnson honours
attributes.additional_details: To restore the integrity and moral compass of the UK parliamentarians and encourage conduct which befits the office
attributes.background: Debate the suitability of these persons to receive honours and consider preventing future prime ministers from issuing honours lists if they themselves have misled parliament and lied to the Queen etc.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same/a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639433
